website_summaries.verdict: This powerful glass grinder comes with everything you need to get started on your new hobby.
pros: The 9.5-by-9.5-inch work surface can accommodate a variety of projects and the high-speed grinder comes with three bits so you can shape and smooth exactly the way you require
The lubricant, face shield, and foot switch are appreciated inclusions
cons: Occasionally, a defective unit may slip through quality control, but those issues are rare

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grinder thinking it would be easy to use and I would get years out of it. I use the lubricant and it still seizes up frequently. I have followed the instructions and still it does not provide consistent grinding for stained glass. I am not using in inappropriately, it just does not work. The frustration I have with this grinder is beyond measure. It is an easy set up but the seizing is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: I did do some research on grinders. Importance on motor size, warranty, price point etc. I am very pleased with my purchase. Its grinds perfect and all the parts and extra bits were included.. I had no issues with the seller. I would recommend this grinder. I do not use the grinder for commercial just a personal hobby. Got it in delivered next day.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna K.

product_meta.title: Power Max II Deluxe Grinder
product_meta.description: School Specialty Power Max II Deluxe Glass Grinder with advanced Super Sponge water cooling system is ideal for shaping and smoothing your cut glass edges. High speed professional router style grinder features a 9-1/2 in x 9 -1/2 in easy glide work surface and a 1/8 hp motor, making it a powerful grinder. It also features 1 in, 3/4 in and 1/4 in chrome hardened Silver Bullet bits for every grinding requirement, a face shield and a handy foot switch.
